message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking $16,000 to start. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $14,000. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $14,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
